jmines.control.listeners
Class WindowListenerForMainFrame

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.WindowListenerForMainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowListener, EventListener
public class WindowListenerForMainFrame
extends Object
implements WindowListener

The Windows listener used for the main frame.

Author:
Zleurtor
